desc: Say goodbye to bed bugs. Take control of your bed bug infestation with our professional-grade do-it-yourself treatment and prevention solutions.

layout.text: We offer professional grade products that will help you both solve your Bed Bug issue and prevent them from coming back. We know this first hand because we are Bed Bug Exterminators. Unlike other sites, Bed Bug Warehouse is a branch of one of New York's largest Bed Bug Exterminators. We carry products that we actually use ourselves. From our quality products to our in-depth consultation services, you can reclaim your home!
